Subsection.Text: Negotiation is effective even if obtained:

Paragraph.Text: From an infant, a corporation exceeding its powers, or a person without capacity;
By fraud, duress, or mistake; or
In breach of duty or as part of an illegal transaction.

Subsection.Text: To the extent permitted by other law, negotiation may be rescinded or may be subject to other remedies, but those remedies may not be asserted against a subsequent holder in due course or a person paying the instrument in good faith and without knowledge of facts that are a basis for rescission or other remedy.
